items.summary: Add an in-app explanation of the platform custom-domain prompt and its naming rules, making it clear that a custom domain is optional and that domain names must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no spaces, '+', '/', commas, or other punctuation).

Enforce display-name validation in the backend so that UserProfile.displayName must be between 5 and 50 characters (inclusive) and may contain only letters (A–Z, a–z), numbers (0–9), and hyphens ('-'). Reject invalid values with a clear English error message.

Add matching frontend validation for display name on the Age Verification (profile creation) screen and Profile edit screen: require 5–50 characters and only letters, numbers, and hyphens; show clear English inline guidance and prevent submission when invalid.
